enterprise-tier.title: Enterprise
enterprise-tier.subtitle: All in Plus, plus:
enterprise-tier.feature-1: Your data in your medical center

question-1.title: What is Amaranto?
question-1.content: It's a digital platform for medical professionals responsible for managing consultations, enriched with tools that make its adoption easier, such as summarizing or digitizing medical records.

question-2.title: Is it safe?
question-2.content-1: Sure, we have backup copies saved by region: for clinics in the European Union, and the rest of the world. If security is your priority,
question-2.content-2: for isolated databases for your clinic, or to use your own servers.

question-3.title: If I use the Beta platform, will my data be secure?
question-3.content: Absolutely! We encrypt the information end-to-end, and we don't have access to the information when it reaches our servers, even in the Beta.

question-4.title: When will the platform be launched?
question-4.content: We are improving the user experience of the platform, along with enhancing server resilience. We don't have a defined date yet; it depends on how many registrations we have in the Beta program and the interaction they have with it.
